column2: They have much experience charging from the beachhead and flanking enemy positions on the shoreline.
Marines of a thousand voyages, they have learnt much from the sea including its mortal poisons.
These Marines have found fire, works just as well against warriors as it does against enemy ships.
Only Shadow Warriors and the Sisters of Averlorn are considered their betters, though this is not always been proven to be true.
Only the greatest of Asuryan spearmen may join the company of the Bright Falcon.
Former Lothern Sea Guards, their skill was unsurpassed with a spear and handpicked to join this illustrious company.
